attributes.action: Save HMS President as part of our History.
attributes.additional_details: The river Thames is slowly losing many of its riverfront sites and this needs to be saved to preserve the history on the Victoria  Embankment.
attributes.background:
HMS President is a ship and corporate venue moored on the Thames and was built in 1918 as a Q ship. 
It would be a terrible shame to have this ship scrapped at a time when we are at the centenary of the first world war.

rejection.details:
As we understand it, HMS President is not currently owned by the Government. We are not sure whether your petition is asking for the UK Government to use public money to buy HMS President from its current owners.

You could start a new petition calling for the specific action you want to see.
